Benefits of sleep:

* Improves memory and learning
* Enhances creativity and problem-solving skills
* Boosts immune system
* Lowers risk of disease and early death
* Helps regulate emotions and mental health

Optimizing sleep:

* Prioritize sleep as a critical aspect of overall health
* Maintain a consistent sleep schedule
* Create a dark, cool, and quiet sleep environment
* Avoid caffeine, alcohol, and nicotine close to bedtime
* Turn off electronic devices at least 30 minutes before sleep

Quotes from Matt Walker:

* “The number of people who can survive on five hours of sleep or less without any impairment, expressed as a percent of the population and rounded to a whole number, is zero.”
* “Sleep is the Swiss Army knife of health. When sleep is deficient, there is sickness and disease. And when sleep is abundant, there is vitality and health.”
* “Sleep is not an optional lifestyle luxury. Sleep is a non-negotiable biological necessity. It is your life support system.”
* “If you want to be more productive and creative, and to have more energy, the science dictates that you should sleep more, not less.”
